name: Tears of Vampeon
description:
Español

Tienes el control del un poderoso guerrero vampiro llamado Vampeon, cuyo poder es transformar su sangre en armas. Si te quedas sin disparos, te quedas sin sangre.

Un demonio ha irrumpido tus dominios ¿Será capaz Vampeon en reclamar los dominios de su castillo?

Consejos

Tus flechas consumen tu vida y el daño que recibes consume tus flechas, solo tienes 100 oportunidades. Apunta a los puntos débiles de tu enemigo para derrotarlo

Controles:

W A S D - Movimiento

Click izquierdo - Disparar

Espacio - Dash

English

You take control of a powerful vampire knight named Vampeon, whose power is to convert his blood into arrows, if you're running out of arrows you're running out health. A demon breaks into his castle, will Vampeon be able to reclaim his castle?

Tips

- Your arrows and your health both use your Blood so each time you get hit or shoot an arrow you lose one Blood point. Be careful as you only have a 100 .

How to defeat the boss

- The boss' weak points are it's eyes so aim for them. 

-Collect the floating Blood drops to retrive a Blood point.

Controls 

W A S D - Movement

Left Click  - shoot

Espace - Dash

Game made for Indie Spain Jam
